Name: Malignant Chain
Effect: Single Target. Unique. Roll 5 Chance Dice to Badly Poison the Target. At the end of the Round, if the Target was Poisoned by this Move, roll their Loyalty, get at least 3 successes, if it fails, from the next Round the Target becomes the user's Ally untl the poison is healed.
Description: This chain contains the most potent neurotoxin currently known. It boosts physical appearance, yet totally suppresses the mind and soul, turning the target into the userâ€™s puppet.
